attributes.comment:
Please do not accept the fee increases proposed in this document. As an adoptive
parent, I know the full impact of a fee increase on families. Adoption is an
extremely expensive process and the fees we pay to complete the required USCIS
paperwork are already a noticeable expense. The proposed increases would hit
adoptive families multiple times for more money. I believe strongly in taking
care of children in the world who need forever families and if the process
becomes more expensive than it already is, many more children may not have the
chance to find their forever family.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Emily Askea
